title: Development of Sliders for Furniture Manufacturer MaxMalevich
description: Development of 3 custom sliders for a website built on the Tilda constructor

info.client: MaxMalevich - a premium home furniture manufacturer with its own full-cycle production.

tasks.2: Full layout based on the design concept
tasks.3: Working within the limits of Tilda

1.title: Constructor
1.text: The sliders must be able to be moved by the designer. Therefore, Zero-block must be used, rather than full code layout.

2.title: Styles
2.text: It was necessary to override the constructor styles to create a responsive slider.

3.title: Autoscale
3.text: The design is made with the Autoscale parameter, so it was important to account for this parameter to ensure proper slider behavior.

dev.1: Photos and necessary links are stored in an array.
